text: He manaba jati! Tomara tomadera palanakartake bhaya kara ebam bhaya kara emana eka dibasake, yakhana pita putrera kona kaje asabe na ebam putra'o tara pitara kona upakara karate parabe na. Nihsandehe allahara oyada satya. Ata'eba, parthiba jibana yena tomaderake dhomka na deya ebam allaha samparke prataraka sayatana'o yena tomaderake pratarita na kare.
